summary: This mod allows you to summon a Skeletal warrior.
descriptionHtml:
This mod allows you to summon a Skeletal warrior. 

Skeleton features:
- Scales with your level
- Random Dragur weapons (BattleAxe is the coolest)
- Cheap on Magicka
- When he dies he does a cool electric effect

To start Conjuring your own skeletons, just go to Riverwood --> Riverwood Trader --> The vendor\'s counter

Steam Workshop alternative:
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=9789
author: ostraion
